Section.name: About Amity University Gurgaon
Section.description:
Amity University Gurugram is a private university established in 2010 by the Amity Education Group. The university is approved by UGC & AICTE and holds the membership of AIU. Amity Gurgaon is accredited by NAAC with an “A+” Grade. It is also accredited by INC, BCI, PCI, COA, and IET, UK. Amity University Gurgaon campus is spread over an area of 110 acres. It is the only India and Asia’s second university to be awarded LEED (USA) Platinum certification. It offers UG, PG, and Doctoral courses in the fields of Commerce, Computer Science, Engineering, Literature, Management, Finance, Mass Communication, Travel and Tourism, Social Science, etc. Amity University Gurgaon has been ranked 94th Overall, 81st in Management, 99th in Engineering, and 23rd in Law as per the NIRF Rankings 2023.
